DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset (e.g. because an _IfcPipeFittingType_ is associated), or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcPipeFittingTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcPipeFittingTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS (SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either there is no pipe fitting type object associated, i.e. the _IsTypedBy_ inverse relationship is not provided, or the associated type object has to be of type _IfcPipeFittingType_.
